attributes.action: keep the greenbelt for the public!... not the rich!...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: lets build affordable housing for our kids on the tennis courts of tony,s den chequers.how about sandringham,highgrove or anywhere else the taxed to death public pay so hard for the so called elitists to enjoy.maybe our kids might srtike lucky with a cardboard box sleeping on a bench in a pristine park designated for tourists benefit....

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
